content: on 3 dpns 3 sts on each needle 1 *k1 k2tog* repeat to end 1 k all sts 2 k all sts 2 * k1 kfb k1* repeat on each ndl k all sts for 1 inch 3 *k2tog* repeat to end 3 *k1 kfb k2* repeat on each ndl k all sts for 1 inch cut yarn and thread through remaining live sts pull tightly 4 *k2 kfb k2* repeat on each ndl k all sts for 1 inch closed insert needle down through center pull tip inward to 5 *k1 k2tog k2tog k1* repeat on each needle create a rounded paw stuff about half of the leg lightly make 6-7 k all sts make another one exactly the same and sew to bottom of body 8 *k1 k2tog k1* repeat on each needle legs should extend out about 1 inch from base of head and lay 9-10 k all sts side- side by side 11 *k2tog k1* repeat on each needle 12 k all sts cut yarn and thread through remaining live stitches pull tightly and secure on outside of ear fold in half lengthwise stitch together at bottom only and sew to rabbit for 1 inch on each side of ear enjoy 4
